SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.service

Interface ConsumerAddressService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsumerAddressServiceImpl
public interface ConsumerAddressService
This interface provides methods to manage consumer addresses like the retrieval, creation, and updating of consumer address details.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addConsumerAddress(String UID, ConsumerAddressDTO consumerAddress)
    Creates a new consumer address for the user with the given UID.
    ConsumerAddressDTO
    getConsumerAddress(String UID)
    Retrieves the consumer address associated with the given user ID (UID).
    void
    updateConsumerAddress(String UID, Map<String,Object> data)
    Updates the address details of an existing consumer account identified by the given UID.

  • Method Details

    • getConsumerAddress

      ConsumerAddressDTO getConsumerAddress(String UID) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the consumer address associated with the given user ID (UID).
      Parameters:
      UID - The user ID of the consumer whose address is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A ConsumerAddressDTO containing the consumer's address details.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs while retrieving the address data asynchronously.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted.

    • addConsumerAddress

      void addConsumerAddress(String UID, ConsumerAddressDTO consumerAddress)
      Creates a new consumer address for the user with the given UID.
      Parameters:
      UID - The unique identifier of the consumer to associate the address with.
      consumerAddress - The ConsumerAddressDTO object containing the address details to be added.

    • updateConsumerAddress

      void updateConsumerAddress(String UID, Map<String,Object> data)
      Updates the address details of an existing consumer account identified by the given UID.
      Parameters:
      UID - The unique identifier of the consumer whose address is to be updated.
      data - A map containing the fields to be updated, where the key is the field name and the value is the new value.
